4px;white-space:nowrap}var{font:italic 700 1rem/1.6 monospace}iframe{border:none}button,input[type=button i],input[type=reset i],input[type=submit i]{background:none;border:none;cursor:pointer;display:inline-block;min-height:44px;min-width:44px}#index header{align-items:center;background:linear-gradient(to top left,#28b487,#7dd56f);display:flex;height:100vh}#index header h1{color:#fff;font-family:sans-serif;font-size:50px;line-height:1.3;padding:30px;text-align:center;width:100%}#index main{background-color:#fff7c9;display:flex;font-family:Arial;font-size:20px;justify-content:space-between;padding:50px}#index main article{width:60%}#index main article ul li{list-style-type:disc}#index main aside{width:30%}#index main aside h2{font-size:35px;margin-bottom:25px}#index main aside h3{margin-bottom:20px;text-align:center}#index main aside p{margin-bottom:20px}#index main aside .first{color:red}#index main aside #your-name{background-color:#ffdc69;border:5px solid #444;margin-top:30px;padding:25px;width:400px}#index main aside button,#index main aside input{font-size:16px;padding:10px}#index main aside a{background-color:#9acd32}#index main aside #course-image{width:300px}#index main aside #your-name h2{color:#6b8e23}
